author: Tegan Taylor
title: 'When can I see my grandparents?': Questions from kids about the coronavirus
description: What does the germ look like? Does it make you turn green? We answer real kids' questions about the coronavirus. (Grown-ups might find this helpful too!)
content:
What does the coronavirus look like? Why is it making people so sick? Does it make you turn green? 
We asked kids to send in their questions about the coronavirus and hundreds of you did!
We wish we could have answered every question, but we didn't have roo… [+8206 chars]
